name.value: TDD-2 - Advanced - 01 - Reliable - 01 - Patient Create Search Static - JSON

description.value: Reliable Testing - First test creating a static Patient fixture in JSON format. Search for the created Patient using known, hard-coded values from the static fixture.

Create a Patient in JSON format using a static fixture. The expected response code is 201 (Created). The response payload may contain the created Patient resource or an OperationOutcome resource in JSON format.
Create a Patient in JSON format using a static fixture
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 201(Created).
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Location is present.

Search for the created Patient in JSON format using family, given, gender and birthDate parameters. The expected response code is 200 (OK). The response payload is expected to be a Bundle searchset resource containing a single entry with the found Patient in JSON format.
Search for the created Patient in JSON format
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the response payload contains the Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 entry. Warning only to account for potential duplicate Patient creations.
